channel.title: Notes on Andrii Bilorus
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Andrii Bilorus

item.title: My journey with fedora. The begining.
item.description: My journey with fedora. The begining. Let me start with saying that I have been an ubuntu guy. I’ve been using deb based distros since 2014 on my desktop. For some reason every time I tried redhat-like OS, the venture failed. Every time some crap happened. In addition, I don’t really like neither the current fedora artwork nor its fonts. Speaking of fonts, ubuntu has the perfect fonts, I loved them.
